BingeHack4

Posted by Stephen Demos on idiot day

BingeHack4 is a fork of NetHack4, which is a fork of NetHack. BingeHack4 includes modernization features and the updated codebase of NetHack4, and also custom features that improve concurrent play, such as a board that displays everyone playing on a server, and an extensive achievements system.
